1.title: January 1, 2014
1.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Top Celebrity Twitter Mishaps of 2013: Amanda Bynes makes big time twitter news again and you will never believe who is her victim this week! justin Bieber Attacked on Twitter! George Clooney Hates Twitter. Boy Meets World Star attacked on Twitter! Mystery Girl Dishes on Bieber in Bed! TECHNOLOGY Top Computer Development Stories of 2013: Computers Infected With NSA Malware. New Mac Pro Sleek, Sexy, and Innovative. Computers Hackable Via Audio Input and Output. Shushing Obnoxious Sounds with Computer Chips. Dell Computers Smell like Cat Urine! FASHION Top...

2.title: January 2, 2014
2.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Top Films of 2013: The Hobbit: the Desolation of Smaug Unexpectedly Smashes at Korean Box Offices. "Gravity" Sales Are Out of This World. The Hunger Games Set Fire To The Box Office. Brad Pitt hits the Big Apple for WORLD WAR Z! Catching Fire Lands Rave Reviews. SPORTS Biggest Sports Losses of 2013: Andy Murray Beats Fernando Verdasco in a Nail Biting Wimbledon! Oklahoma City Thunder Take Down the Bulls! Auburn beats Alabama with a 109-yard Field-goal Return! UCLA Defeats USC for the Second Consecutive Year. Detroit Tigers Destroy Chicago White Sox 7-3! ...

3.title: January 3, 2014
3.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Top Celebrity Scandals of 2013: Mike Tyson's Stalker/Alleged Mistress Gets Slammed! Alec Baldwin Loses His Late Night Talk Show! Lamar Odom Disciplined for August DUI. Did Robin Thicke Plagiarize Marvin Gaye? Miley Wasn't Thinking! SPORTS Top Boxing Stories of 2013: Pacquiao Beats Rios, Unanimous Decision. Fighting for the UFC light heavyweight championship see if Jon Jones retained his belt against Alexander Gustafsson. Boxer Dies Following Fight. Mike Tyson's return to the world of boxing. Manny Pacquiao Still Wins After Losing. GAMING Top Next Gen ...

4.title: January 4, 2014
4.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Top Reality TV Stories of 2013: Kendall Jenner gets Porn Deal for Her Birthday! Kim and Kanye's Expensive Engagement! Khloe Kardashian and Lamar Odom are Separated! Tragedy Strikes the Reality TV Show THE BACHELOR! Shaq Says No to Ex-Wife's Reality Show. SPORTS Top Sports Rumors of 2013: The Phoenix Coyotes May be Relocating to Seattle! Cano Heads Out West. Mark Trumbo Traded To Arizona Diamondbacks. Brodeur Opens the Door on Trade. Dustin Pedroia Signing a $100 Million Extension? GAMING Top World of Warcraft Stories of 2013: WoW: Warlords of Draenor ...

5.title: January 6, 2014
5.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Lil Kim is in a Lil Trouble. Clay Aiken: The Next American Congressman? Duck Dynasty Launching Own Line of Guns. Beyonce May Have Been a Little Too Insensitive on New Track. Ke$ha Goes to Rehab. GAMING Wikipad developments enhances Gaming on Androids. Windows WoW Users Get Infected. Xbox One Chosen for "Chozen." Rushlab's New Space Game Gets a Kickstarter. Quantic Gaming Owes a Ton of People a Ton of Money. SPORTS San Francisco 49ers Play Green Bay Packers In Frigid Weather. San Diego Chargers Stun Cincinnati Bengals. Swansea City Face Off Manchester ...

6.title: January 22, 2014
6.plot: Hot Music Stories of Grammy Nominees and more: Hot music news you need to know: American Music Awards breakdown. Miley and Katy shock at the AMA's. Amanda Lambert weight loss controversy. Chris Brown heads back to rehab after a dust-up at anger management. Springsteen drops his 18th studio album. High-cost tickets to Brittany Spears new Vegas show. SPORTS Top Stories of Sports Icons: See what the top sports icons in the world are up to at this very moment. Kobe Bryant's new contract, Pele's difficult decision, and why you won't see Mike Tyson in London anytime soon.

7.title: January 23, 2014
7.plot: Justin Bieber's Bad Boy Recap. Catch up on the roller-coaster ride that led to Justin Bieber's arrest. 3 Minute Update recaps Justin's Bad Boy moments. Strippers, Drugs, and the Biebs...Oh...My... SPORTS The Road to Super Bowl XLVIII.The Road to Super Bowl XLVIII has been riddled with injuries and upsets. Lets take a look back at the NFL stories that built the road to Super Bowl XLVIII. This video includes: Peyton Manning's on going ankle injuries, The Dallas Cowboy's epic collapse, Seattle Seahawks wide receiver woes, Adrian Foster's failed season, and Aaron Rodger's...

8.title: January 24, 2014
8.plot: The Award for Best Celebrity Lawyer goes to... It's Award Season, so 3 Minute Update decided to take a look at the legal cases that shaped the celebrity world and the stars that should be presenting their lawyers with a nomination for best lawyer. And the nominations go to: Wesley Snipes for tax invasion, Too $hort for DUI, Lindsay Lohan and Bobby Brown for DUI, and Reese Witherspoon for resisting arrest. SPORTS Sports Stories that Broke Las Vegas. These are the sports stories that lost us all money, the moments when the betting line was busted and the bookies won the...

9.title: January 27, 2014
9.plot: Celebrity Drug Use and addiction runs rampant amongst actors and musicians. Miley Cyrus on "molly" during her MTV performance? Lindsay Lohan talks about Rehab, Matthew Perry opens up a Sober Living house. Plus Zac Efron and 'So You Think You Can Dance' Adam Shankman. Futuristic Transportation...Getting around in the not so distant future has taken a quantum leap in the real and virtual world. Icon build an Electric Bike that goes up to 35 mph. Plus an Amphibious Car and a Homemade Jet Pack? The Busy World of Marc Jacobs. Chronicling just a sliver of the amazingly busy...

10.title: January 28, 2014
10.plot: Tom Cruise's Love-life: Tom Cruise is newly single and ready to date! Are the rumors true, ex-Katie Holmes and Jamie Foxx dating? Is Scientology trying to pick Tom Cruise's next wife? SPORTS: With Super Bowl XLVIII less than week away, let's take a look at the events, plays and games that built the Denver Broncos' Road to the Super Bowl. NSA Tech Fallout: Edward Snowden's revelations on what the NSA has been doing with our private information as well as other secretive moves the NSA has made to access anyone's data.

11.title: January 29, 2014
11.plot: Chris Brown's Indiscretions: As Chris Brown counts down the days until his court-appointed rehab ends let's take a look at the troubled road that led him there. Seattle Seahawks - Super Bowl XLVIII 2014: The Seattle Seahawks will be representing the NFC in the 2014 Super Bowl, let's take a look back at the news, plays and events that shaped their Super Bowl season. Obamacare Ramifications: Fresh off the State of the Union Address, let's take a look at President Obama's iconic healthcare plan and the ups and downs of Obamacare in its infancy.

12.title: January 30, 2014
12.plot: SPORTS Why the Dallas Cowboys are NOT in the Super Bowl. The Dallas Cowboys had a "fail" of a season, let's take a look back at the roller-coaster ride that was the Dallas Cowboys season. TECHNOLOGY Facebook's Non Stop Growth. Just when your investor said it was safe to sell, Facebook's growth once again rocks the Stock Market. The company's new growth data proves this is one stock to hold on to.

13.title: January 31, 2014
13.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Lady Gaga's Woes: It seems everyone is out to get Lady Gaga. Lawsuits, feuds, scams and Lady Gaga personal stylist, Nicola Formichetti, quits and heads to Diesel. SPORTS Major League Sports Injuries: Each major league sport has seen its share of injuries. Let's take a look back at each major sport and the injuries our athletes had to overcome. From Peyton Manning's ankles to Kobe Bryant's knees plus Kevin Ware, Albert Pujols, Marion Bartoli and Sidney Crosby.

14.title: February 3, 2014
14.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Rihanna: Wild Stories. Rihanna has had quite a wild ride! Let's take a look back at the news that has shaped her career and made her the Bad Girl of music. GAMING Kickstarter in the Gaming World. An overview of the extremely successful world of launching games via Kickstarter and crowd funding.

15.title: February 4, 2014
15.plot: ENTERTAINMENT The Busy World of Justin Timberlake. Justin Timberlake is one of the hardest working celebrities in the industry. Here's a peak into the wild work habits of Justin Timberlake. TECHNOLOGY Blackberry Struggles to Stay Alive! As BlackBerry devices accounted for 0 percent of all smartphone activations they struggles to stay alive. What will become of Blackberry will they be bought out or go private?

16.title: February 5, 2014
16.plot: SPORTS The Fall of Alex Rodriguez! New York Yankee slugger Alex Rodriguez has fallen from grace in the world of Major League Baseball. Here's the series of events that led up to his record breaking suspension. TECHNOLOGY Samsung on the Rise! Samsung is slowly taking over the world! Samsung Rises To Nearly Double Apple's Smartphone Sales! Plus TV's, tablets and cross platform devices.

17.title: February 6, 2014
17.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Selena Gomez Secretly in Rehab! Selena Gomez secretly went to rehab for two weeks not for substance abuse but help getting over Justin Bieber. Let's look back at their on and off again relationship. SPORTS Why We Love Kevin Durant and the Thunder. Some players have it all, the talent and the will to win. Kevin Durant has all that and a bit more! Here's a rundown on why WE love Kevin Durant.

18.title: February 7, 2014
18.plot: SPORTS Jay-Z: From Hip Hop Icon to Sports Agent! First, he was a Hip Hop Icon, then he took over the fashion world, now the Icon known as Jay-Z is looking to take over the sports world. Here's how Jay-Z went from Hip Hop Icon to Sports Agent. TECHNOLOGY The Amazing Amazon: Amazon keeps growing to the point where they dictate market growth, technology and even the US Postal Service's schedule.

19.title: February 10, 2014
19.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Kayne West Family Man! Kanye West ditches his bad boy persona to be a family man and Kim Kardashian loves what an amazing father he is to their daughter North West! TECHNOLOGY AT&T Continues its Dominance. AT&T continues its dominance of the wireless market. Not only are they the biggest and the fastest, they have also been working with the CIA for 25 years as a counter-terrorism capacity.

21.title: February 12, 2014
21.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Charlie Sheen - The Paradox of Winning. Charlie Sheen: Cocaine Fueled Porn Star Loving Playboy? Or Devoted father of 5 and new grandfather and Make-A-Wish philanthropist? The answer is: Yes. SPORTS David Beckham: Life After Football. David Beckham career on the pitch has come to an end, BUT fans of Beckham have no need to worry! Here's David Beckham's plan for life after football.

22.title: February 13, 2014
22.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Angelina's Brave New World! Angelina's private life, marriage, and her will to fight cancer. Her double mastectomy inspiring others! FASHION Stella McCartney Stands Up for Women. Stella McCartney designs a new ribbon for violence against women while continuing a new line with Gwenyth Paltrow and more.

23.title: February 14, 2014
23.plot: BUSINESS Warren Buffett: Wizard of Omaha. Some people say they know the market, But the Wizard of Omaha proves he knows the market, time and time again. Let's take a look at the most important statements and moves Warren Buffett made last year. SPORTS Derek Jeter: Injury plagued 2013 to Retirement. Derek Jeter has announced that he will retire at the end of the 2014 MLB season. Let's take a look back at his nightmare 2013 Season to understand why.

24.title: February 17, 2014
24.plot: SPORTS Hole in One: Best Golf Stories of 2013. An overview of the last year of golf as the new young guns win for the first time, while Phil and Tiger (who are still number one and two in the money) can't find a major win. Watch as Tiger makes a rookie mistake and sits tied for 48th place because of it. TECHNOLOGY Apple Expands and Acquires. In the face of slowing iPhone and mac sales, Apple finds itself acquiring companies and making strategic deals with Nike to ensure their monstrous profits continue. The massive new Apple Campus that's just beginning to get ...

25.title: February 18, 2014
25.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Celebrity Stalkers: Being a celebrity comes with lots of attention, some of which is unwanted. Stalkers can be anything from an annoyance, to completely terrifying and dangerous, and in rare circumstances, celebrities even stalk each other! SPORTS Lamar Odom from Drug Addict to Spanish Basketball. Lamar Odom has had one action packed year! And now he's off to play ball in Spain! BUT before we punch that passport, let's take a look back and see how Lamar Odom went from Kardashian regular to drug addict to starting forward for Laboral Kutxa of the Spanish ...

26.title: February 19, 2014
26.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Harry Styles, Love and Space? Harry Styles has burst on to the scene and is breaking women's (and men's) hearts all the way into space! FASHION Versace is less than thrilled with Gina Gershon's portrayal of fashion legend Donnatella Versace, but Lifetime doesn't seem to care. M.I.A. has teamed up with Versace and the famed Miami mansion has sold for 41.5 million.

27.title: February 20, 2014
27.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

28.title: February 21, 2014
28.plot: Gaming, A Look Back: Electronic Arts Dominance Part 1. The first part of a look back at EA and their many titles, established and upcoming; finished and still under development in pre-alpha stages. Sports, Spring Training: Boston Red Sox. Pitchers and Catchers report. It's time for Boston baseball. But before we kick off the 2014 MLB season, let's take a look back at the Red Sox's 2013 highlights.

29.title: February 24, 2014
29.plot: Katy Perry's Personal Life. Despite some outrageous rumors, Katy Perry has bounced back from some very dark and even suicidal post-divorce times to be very much in love with boyfriend John Mayer. While her life seems happy and together, her parents most definitely do not approve. Ryan Braun: Road to Redemption. As the Milwaukee Brewers report for Spring Training, all eyes will be on Ryan Braun. Lets take a look back at the PEDs scandal that rocked MLB in 2013 and see how Ryan Braun played the lead role.

30.title: February 25, 2014
30.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Robin Thicke as Thieves? Robin Thicke and Paula Patton have split after 20 years together! Cheating accusations both in his marriage and his music. SPORTS Nike: What to Expect in 2014. Nike is ready for a big 2014!! Let's take a look back and investigate how the brand positioned its self to take over the sporting world.

31.title: February 26, 2014
31.plot: ENTERTAINMENT Bye Bye Bynes! Amanda Bynes is sadly slipping away into increasingly erratic behavior. From trespassing in old folks homes to starting fires, she has wound up in mental wards with 5150 holds and rehabs to hopefully get better. GAMING A Look Back: Call of Duty. Call of Duty and its massive world of expansion packs and social networking has had a very busy year with multiple updates and a seemingly never ending world.

32.title: February 27, 2014
32.plot: SPORTS Tiger Woods: A Look Back at 2013. 2013 was a year of ups and downs for Tiger Woods, let take a look back at the failures of his 2013 season. FASHION A Look at Fashion Week. Winter Spring Summer & Fall, all you got to do is...break out your checkbook! The two biggest trendsetting events, Fashion Week NYC and Fashion Week Paris never disappoint. All of the "must -have" designs as well as some that even the richest can only see and not buy are showcased at this Triple A-List event.

33.title: February 28, 2014
33.plot: BUSINESS The World of Wal-Mart A look back at a very busy holiday season for the nation's largest retailer. From same sex insurance coverage for their workers to employees going on strike, it's a tightrope game for this retail giant. Even accidentally selling $800 electronics for $8 can't keep this Goliath down. FASHION H&M's Ethical Decisions. H&M has been embroiled in ethical conundrums, and seems to have done the right thing across the board. Halting the abuse of Angora rabbits, ceasing the insulting of Native Americans and paying a living wage to Asian factory ...
